channel.title: Wallets on Rhombus Project Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Wallets on Rhombus Project Wiki

item.title: Wallets overview
item.description: You can use one or all of them, it’s up to you. Overview Rhombus Core is a recommended wallet for most users as it offers the best of Rhombus’s features Desktop Main, desktop wallets for Windows, macOS and Linux Rhombus Core – Qt-based wallet focused on stability and advanced features Rhombus Copay – Mobile & desktop wallet with multi-sig for increased security Mobile Mobile wallets for Android and iOS
